ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Fashion Police
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope, get grass belt from giants in the same places as you can get lumberjack caps are 10AC (they weigh a little more but the extra ac is worth it). I d highly
ygData.messageBody:
Nope, get grass belt from giants in the same places as you can get
lumberjack caps are 10AC (they weigh a little more but the extra ac is worth
it).

I'd highly recommend a troll-hide belt once you can afford one though. It's
only 5AC but the 5str 5dex is nice. Later on you can upgrade to the cat
belt (not sure exact name and I have one rofl) which is 5ac +9str +13 dex.

Good luck!

Lyrnia
----- Original Message -----
From: "Elijah Meeker" <emeeker@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 12, 2000 3:32 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Fashion Police


>
> > Thanks, I'll do that. It looks like Kunark's the place to be to get
> > one of these too! Oh, and it's about 4lbs lighter than the bronze
> > helm, which is great as I'm already borderline encumbered as it is.
>
> oh, if that is the case, get a Thick Leather Apron for your belt, light
> weight, great AC, very fashionable, about 20pp. Rumored to be available in
> Wheat, Taupe, Ecru and Burgundy.
>
>
> Tsengu
>
